Viviane Filgueiras Evangelista

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/3379575559292247
  • Última atualização do currículo em 11/06/2014

- TRAINING IN ISO 14001-EMS, ISO 9001, Effective Utility Leadership Practices, Project Management, Strategic Management, Foundations of Business Strategy, Biofuels - CORE COMPETENCES IN quality control and process development tools (data mining, machine learning, MVA, D.O.E., Six Sigma, process modelling and optimization,, etc) - SPECIALIST IN polymer science and processing, with proven track record of PEF product development (green technologies), supported-catalysts, properties, reactors,,, etc - EXPERIENCED IN delivering quality control solutions, and model-based optimization approaches in order to improve the performance of BRASKEM s PET MSP & SSP plants - EXPERT IN statistical (Statistica, Minitab, SAS Analytics, SAS JMP) & engineering (Aspen, Matlab, Mathcad, Fortran) softwares and also in simulation software development - WORKED IN different laboratories with polyesters (PET, PEF, PES, PBS), polyamides (PA 66), polyolefins (HDPE) / metallocene catalysts and processes (bulk, suspension & solution): Laboratory of Polymer Technology (Greece, 1 year), Lab of Process Modelling, Simulation & Control (Rio de Janeiro, 5 years) and CCRG Group (Salvador, 2 years) - WORKED WITH petroleum & gas engineering projects at MANA Engineering and Consulting S. A. and petrochemical plants operation routine at COPENOR/METANOR S. A. - RESULTS-DRIVEN. Analytical problem-solver with strong math skills. Outgoing personality with proven ability to deliver work without supervision or collaboratively in teams - PhD in Chemical Engineering from COPPE, an international centre of excellence in engineering education, Chemical Engineer and Chemist (Texto informado pelo autor)

Atuação Profissional

COPPETEC Foundation, LMSCP Laboratory, RIO DE JANEIRO, Brasil.
Vínculo institucional

2010 - Atual
Vínculo: Postdoc Researcher, Enquadramento Funcional: Product Engineer, Carga horária: 40
Outras informações
- EXPERIENCE in poy(ethylene 2,5-furandicarboxylate)/ PEF product development, a bio-based FDCA/furanic plastic entitled to replace PET in the market - VALUABLE teamwork experience in research-oriented green polymer technologies projects, involving renewables (GLY, SA, 1,4-BG, EG, DM-FDCA, etc) - RESPONSABILITES covering planning and functional activities (lab supply management, D.O.E., synthesis, materials testing, process optimization etc)


Laboratory of Polymer Technology, LPT, NTUA, ATHENS, Grécia.
Vínculo institucional

2008 - 2009
Vínculo: Collaboration Contract, Enquadramento Funcional: R & D Engineer, Carga horária: 40
Outras informações
- SYNTHESIZED nylon 66 under kinetic regime to map the preferential degradation pathway (CPT, NH3, CO2) that leads to polymer yellowing in industry - ESTIMATED the full range of kinetic, equilibrium and transport parameters related to fibre-grade polyamide 66 ( PA 66, nylon-66 ) commercial process - UNDERTOOK a N2 gas humidification project from front-end engineering design to execution (including psychrometric charts, equipment, and lines)


BRASKEM S.A., CAMAÇARI POLE, Brasil.
Vínculo institucional

2003 - 2006
Vínculo: Service Contract, Enquadramento Funcional: Modelling and Data Mining Engineer, Carga horária: 40
Outras informações
- DESIGNED and fitted complex engineering models to simulate and control dynamically BRASKEM's PET melt-state and solid-state polymerization plants - MAPPED statistically the process outputs variability through the years and policies responsible for plant-wide oscillations / poor PID loops performance - AS DATA MINING ANALYST, uncovered hidden patterns after data pre-processing to solve plant troubleshooting issues and delivered presentations


MANA Engineering and Consulting S.A., SALVADOR, Brasil.
Vínculo institucional

2002 - 2002
Vínculo: Intern, Enquadramento Funcional: Project Engineer, Carga horária: 20
Outras informações
- ELABORATED input/output instruments lists, logic diagrams and cause & effect matrix in automation projects in the field of petroleum and natural gas - WORKED with instruments specification, including control valves, pumps, flowmeters, sensors and level transmitters for clients as PETROBRÁS, BAYER - WORKED in cross-functional teams (including process, instrumentation and automation areas), communicating at all levels of the organisation


COPENOR S.A., CAMAÇARI POLE, Brasil.
Vínculo institucional

2001 - 2002
Vínculo: Intern, Enquadramento Funcional: Process Engineer, Carga horária: 20
Outras informações
- ACCOMPANIED the chemical synthesis of formol, formaldehyde, pentaerythritol and sodium formate products, working in the industrial production line - ANALYSED the performance of absorption columns with real process data,,, in order to reduce the methanol gas content in the liquid recycling stream - CONTRIBUTED to the quality control program for technical indexes reduction (acidity, salts etc) with patents search and historical data analysis


Coordination Chemistry Research Group, Chemistry Institute, UFBA, SALVADOR, Brasil.
Vínculo institucional

1998 - 2000
Vínculo: Intern, Enquadramento Funcional: Synthesis Chemist, Carga horária: 20
Outras informações
- SYNTHESIZED polyethylenes (HDPE) by hetero (homo)generous catalysed slurry polymerization. Polymer characterization made by MFI, GPC, DSC etc - SYNTHESIZED functionalized silica-supported Zr ( IV ) metallocenes catalysts ( also ansa-bridge ) activated by MAO co-catalyst via Schlenk techniques - SYNTHESIZED MgCl2-supported Ziegler-Natta titanium-based catalysts activated by TEA. Catalysts characterization by BET, SEM, UV-Vis, FTIR, ICP etc - SYNTHESIZED and characterized ruthenium (II) complexes with carboxamides derivatives, inorganic compounds used by pharmaceutical industry
